name: WheelPickerStyle
desc: A picker style that presents the options in a scrollable wheel that shows the selected option and a few neighboring options.

items.name: static var wheel: WheelPickerStyle
items.desc: A picker style that presents the options in a scrollable wheel that shows the selected option and a few neighboring options.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Sets the picker style to display an item wheel from which the user makes a selection.
